system.effect: Energy ripples across the target’s arm, causing skin and muscle to slough disgustingly from the target’s limb, revealing a sticky red mess of sinew and bone. The target suffers [[1d10]] levels of Fatigue and must make a Challenging (+0) Toughness test or be Stunned for [[1d5]] rounds. He now suffers from the Lost Arm condition.
